name: 27th European Biosolids & Bioresources Conference
content: The conference provides an essential annual update on the latest innovations, best practice, cutting-edge technology and research in the biosolids and resource management industries. The 2021 programme included a great line-up of speakers, and included sessions on Anaerobic Digestion, Resource Recovery, Sludge Planning and Landbank Issues, and Pre and Post Digestion Processes. Following the success of last yearâ€™s hybrid event, both live and online attendance will be available again this year. Hear from 40+ speakers, meet exhibitors face-to-face and network with 250+ attendees. The Call for Abstracts will be released in April 2022.
